lines.text: Son, it's time we had a talk.
Oh boy! Is this *that* talk?
Yes. It's time you've learned how to rule the universe.
Oh, this is *that* talk.
We cannot leave the magic!
Look, Ma! I got a Fraggle!
Aaaaaah!

[everyone is singing the opening theme]
Down at Fraggle Rock.
Down at Fraggle Rock!
[Boober puts his face in his hands]

[the fraggles have found Sprocket's ball, which has rolled through the Fraggle hole]
Ugh! It's a hideous round thing!
Junior, are you sure this isn't another one of your dumb hair-brained schemes?
No, Pa, this is one of my smart hair-brained schemes!
Our little Junior's growing up!
I think he's too big already!
Architecture was meant to be enjoyed.
It was rapturous!
Is "rapturous" the same as "boring"?
I don't think so.
Then she's wrong.
Sometimes I wonder why I keep a dog here at all!
The magic is always there, as long as we keep looking for it...
